# jsdoc/require-param-description <Badge type="info" text="Pedantic" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Requires that each `@param` tag has a description value.

### Why is this bad?

The description of a param should be documented.

### Example

```javascript
// Passing
/** @param foo Foo. */
function quux(foo) {}

// Failing
/** @param foo */
function quux(foo) {}
```
